ddl.sql: CREATE TABLE `sunday`.`municipalities` ( `Id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `Name` VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`Id`));

CREATE TABLE `sunday`.`taxes` ( `Id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `MunicipalityId` INT NOT NULL, `Value` DECIMAL NOT NULL, `Type` INT NOT NULL, `Date` DATE NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`Id`), INDEX `fk_municipality_id_idx` (`MunicipalityId` ASC), UNIQUE INDEX `uq_municipality_date` (`MunicipalityId` ASC, `Date` ASC), CONSTRAINT `fk_municipality_id` FOREIGN KEY (`MunicipalityId`) REFERENCES `sunday`.`municipalities` (`Id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION);
